title: Senior Software Engineer (Mobile App Developer) NEW!
full_description: Join Future Research Corporation in support of the U.S. Army PEO Aviation (USAPEO) in Huntsville , Alabama. We are currently looking for candidates with the following qualifications:Senior Software Engineer (Mobile App Developer) with a BS/BA and six (6) years of experience or a Master's degree and four (4) years of experience.Mobile application development for the iOS or Android OS is required.  Web application development using Java, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, MySQL or other web based development tools on a Window or Linux based system is a plus. Experience with system interfaces utilizing web services or other API is beneficial.Secret Clearance is required or must be obtained. Having a DoD Directive 8570 Certification such as a CompTIA Security+ and other computing environment certification is a plusApplicants selected will be subject to a government security investigation and must meet eligibility requirements for access to classified information.FRC is committed to hiring and retaining a diverse workforce. We are an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran statusRequired SkillsRequired Experience
